channel.title: Npc walking
channel.description: [code]alright, i have this in autospawn.cfg [code //------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption2907 //bank spawn = 1597 2892 9677 0 2894 9684 2890 9677 2 Gives starting armour //smith room spawn = 549 2896 9697 0 2896 2698 2894 9696 2 Smith shop //thieving area spawn = 548 2920 9680 0 2916 9683 2921 9678 2 thesalia in thieve area //training area 1 spawn = 90 2931 9697 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Skeleton spawn = 90 2931 9702 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Skeleton spawn = 90 2929 9700 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Skeleton spawn = 90 2934 9696 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Skeleton spawn = 90 2934 9702 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Skeleton spawn = 2275 2929 9702 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Goblin spawn = 2275 2932 9700 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Goblin spawn = 2275 2929 9704 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Goblin spawn = 2275 2929 9695 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Goblin spawn = 82 2933 9687 0 2934 9683 2929 9688 1 Lesser demon spawn = 82 2930 9685 0 2934 9683 2929 9688 1 Lesser demon spawn = 944 2931 9692 0 2933 9694 2989 9690 2 Armour salesman //middle area spawn = 519 2906 9680 0 2905 9680 2907 9679 2 bobs axes //inshi kitchen spawn = 847 2923 9711 0 2919 9709 2924 9706 2 chef spawn = 886 2919 9707 0 2923 9709 2921 9712 2 chef spawn = 942 2919 9711 0 2918 9709 2923 9709 2 chef spawn = 794 2923 9707 0 2921 9712 2919 9706 2 Cook / Salesman [ENDOFSPAWNLIST] [/code] as you can see, they all [i]should[/i] be walking. but only vannaka (give starting armour) walks at all. what's the problem?

item.title: Npc walking
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

alright, i have this in autospawn.cfg [code //------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption2907 //bank spawn = 1597 2892 9677 0 2894 9684 2890 9677 2 Gives starting armour //smith room spawn = 549 2896 9697 0 2896 2698 2894 9696 2 Smith shop //thieving area spawn = 548 2920 9680 0 2916 9683 2921 9678 2 thesalia in thieve area //training area 1 spawn = 90 2931 9697 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Skeleton spawn = 90 2931 9702 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Skeleton spawn = 90 2929 9700 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Skeleton spawn = 90 2934 9696 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Skeleton spawn = 90 2934 9702 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Skeleton spawn = 2275 2929 9702 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Goblin spawn = 2275 2932 9700 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Goblin spawn = 2275 2929 9704 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Goblin spawn = 2275 2929 9695 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Goblin spawn = 82 2933 9687 0 2934 9683 2929 9688 1 Lesser demon spawn = 82 2930 9685 0 2934 9683 2929 9688 1 Lesser demon spawn = 944 2931 9692 0 2933 9694 2989 9690 2 Armour salesman //middle area spawn = 519 2906 9680 0 2905 9680 2907 9679 2 bobs axes //inshi kitchen spawn = 847 2923 9711 0 2919 9709 2924 9706 2 chef spawn = 886 2919 9707 0 2923 9709 2921 9712 2 chef spawn = 942 2919 9711 0 2918 9709 2923 9709 2 chef spawn = 794 2923 9707 0 2921 9712 2919 9706 2 Cook / Salesman [ENDOFSPAWNLIST]
as you can see, they all should be walking. but only vannaka (give starting armour) walks at all.
whatâ€™s the problem?
